spec_data.Name: erlang
spec_data.Description:
Erlang is a general-purpose programming language and runtime
environment. Erlang has built-in support for concurrency, distribution
and fault tolerance. Erlang is used in several large telecommunication
systems from Ericsson.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 07 Oct 2017 03:00:37 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: General-purpose programming language and runtime environment
